api_list.name: get time
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://scout3.p.rapidapi.com/time"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "scout3.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
